380:0: 17. sarvasattvoddhāraṇa saṃbodhimārga sthāpana maheśvaromādevī saṃbodhi vyākaraṇopadeśa prakaraṇam
380:4: kāye dharmāḥ kiyanto'pi vidyante tān samādiśa||
380:5: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena viṣkambhinā niśamya saḥ|
380:9: tadyathāsya tanau lomnāṃ vivareṣu santi ye vṛṣāḥ|
380:13: bādhyante na ca te kleśairduḥkhaiḥ saṃsārikairapi|
380:20: prārthayanti tadā teṣāṃ sarvaṃ saṃsidhyate tathā||
380:43: aśvatthānāṃ vaṭāṇāṃ ca tathānyeṣāṃ ca bhūruhām||
380:53: gandharvāṇāṃ śataṃ smṛtvā triratnaṃ bhajane sadā||
380:61: kathaṃ te mānavā dṛṣṭvā jīvītaṃ bhaṃguropamam|
380:67: sarvadā bhajanaṃ kṛtvā pītvā dharmāmṛtaṃ mudā|
380:88: evaṃ kṛṣṇābhidhe lome vivare kāye jagatprabhoḥ|
380:90: evaṃ tasya jagaddhartuḥ kāye sarve vṛṣāḥ sthitāḥ|
380:92: iti matvāsya sarve'pi śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ|
380:96: durgatiṃ te na gacchanti saṃyāsyanti sukhāvatīm|
380:102: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃstaṃ ca viṣkambhinaṃ jinātmajam|
380:113: dhyātvā nāma samuccārya smṛtvā bhajanti sādaram||
380:114: tāsāṃ sarvāṇi vastūni dravyāṇi bhūṣaṇāni ca|
380:143: tato viśramya sarve te vimāneṣu samāśritāḥ|
380:152: caṃkramya tatra te rātro sarve dhyātvā samāhitāḥ|
380:156: evaṃ te sakalā nityaṃ catussaṃdhyaṃ samāhitāḥ||
380:183: tataḥ sarve'pi te teṣu vimāneṣu samāśritāḥ|
380:188: caṃkramya tatra te sarve viśramya samupāśritāḥ||
380:192: tada teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ prādurbhūtāni sarvataḥ||
380:215: tadā teṣāṃ sa sarvārthaṃ pūrayati yathepsitam||
380:219: tadā paśyanti te sarve sukhāvatyāṃ samāśritam|
380:220: amitābhaṃ jinaṃ taṃ ca sarvalokādhipaṃ prabhum||
380:223: evaṃ sarvān jinān tṛptān bodhisatvāṃśca te mudā|
380:237: taṃ te sarve samabhyarcya prārthayanti prārthayanti yadepsitam||
380:240: teṣāṃ na vidyate kiṃcidduḥkhaṃ kadāpi bhāvikam|
380:241: bādhyante nāpi te sarve kleśai rogādibhiḥ sadā||
380:246: tato'nyasmin vile lomno mahauṣadhyabhidhe ca punaḥ|
380:254: te sarve'pi na bādhyante kleśairduḥkhaiḥ kadācana|
380:285: gandharvāḥ kinnarāḥ siddhāḥ sādhyā rudrā gaṇādhipāḥ|
380:292: rājānaḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ sarve ca mānavāḥ|
380:293: evaṃ ca prāṇinaḥ sarve yāvanto bhavacāriṇaḥ||
380:296: yadā te taṃ jagannāthaṃ dhyātvā smṛtvā samādarat|
380:312: evaṃ te sugatāḥ sarve jambūdvīpe nṛiṇāmapi|
380:314: evaṃ te sarvadā kāle vividhāṃ dharmadeśanām|
380:344: dhyātvā smṛtvāpi nāmāpi samuccārya bhajanti ye||
380:352: śrutvā ca manasā nityaṃ bhāvayet sarvadādarāt|
380:358: tasya kāye jvarāścāṣṭau rogāḥ kuṣṭhādayo'pi ca|
380:360: na ca hīnendriyaścāsau nāpi duḥstho durāśayaḥ|
380:366: iti tena samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sa bhagavān mudā|
380:381: iti tena samākhyāte bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ|
380:383: sādhu sādhu sudhioiro'si yattvamatra punaḥ punaḥ|
380:385: tadahaṃ te prasanno'smi yatsvayaṃ me sabhāśritāḥ|
380:391: iti saṃprārthite tena viṣkambhinā sa sarvavit|
380:397: sarvaṃ tenaiva dṛṣṭāni tāni lomavilāni hi|
380:403: ye ca samantabhadreṇa dṛśyante bhramatāpi na|
380:407: hā me janma niḥsāraṃ yanna dṛṣṭo sa jagatprabhuḥ||
380:408: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ|
380:456: iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sa sugatātmajaḥ|
380:466: iti śāstroditaṃ śrutvā viṣkambhī sa viṣāditaḥ|
380:468: hā mayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yadasya tribhavaprabhoḥ|
380:470: kiṃ mamānena kāyena suciraṃ jīvitena ca|
380:476: kadāsya bhajanaṃ kṛtvā pītvā dharmāmṛtaṃ sadā|
380:478: kadāsya śāsanaṃ dhṛtvā kṛtvā sarvahitaṃ sadā|
380:484: ityevaṃ manasā dhyātvā viṣkambhī sa puro gataḥ|
380:487: draṣṭumicchāmi taṃ nāthaṃ sarvathāhaṃ kuhāpi hi||
380:500: trātā bhartā pitā mātā sanmitraṃ sadgururgatiḥ||
380:508: nāmāpi grahaṇaṃ cāpi smaraṇaṃ cāpi durlabham||
380:509: ye tasya śaraṇe sthitvā dhyātvā smṛtvāpi sarvadā|
380:519: yadā ṣaḍakṣarī vidyāṃ saṃprāpya ye jinātmajāḥ|
380:520: dhyātvā smṛtvā samuccārya japanti śraddhayā sadā||
380:530: iti śāstra samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sa sugatātmajaḥ|
380:534: iti tatprārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ|
380:537: buddhā api na jānanti prāgevānye jinātmajāḥ||
380:547: jānāti ya imāṃ vidyāṃ paramārthaṃ sa vetti hi||
380:552: jānīta ya imāṃ vidyāṃ taṃ darśayitumarhati||
380:559: enāṃ vidyāṃ samicchantaḥ sarvabuddhā jinā api|
380:567: japati yo yadā yatra vidyāmenāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīm|
380:588: tava kukṣi sthitāścāpi sarve prāṇigaṇāḥ khalu|
380:593: mūrdhni kaṇṭhe bhuje vāpi badhvā dadhyāt samāhitaḥ||
380:608: ye ca tasya samucchvāsaiḥ spṛśyante te'pi nirmalāḥ|
380:611: ye cāpi tasya vastrāṇi spṛśanti te'pi nirmalāḥ|
380:613: ye cāpi japamānaṃ taṃ paśyanti te'pi nirmalāḥ|
380:615: pakṣiṇaḥ paśavo vāpi sarve'pi prāṇinaśca ye|
380:616: paśyanti japamānaṃ taṃ te syussarve jinātmajāḥ||
380:619: iti śāstrā smādiṣṭaṃ niśamya sa jinātmajaḥ|
380:631: sa hi mātādhimātā me pitā saṃsāradarśakaḥ|
380:635: iti me bhagavan vakyaṃ satyamevānyathā na hi|
380:636: tatra māṃ preṣayitvāśu yatrāsau sadguruḥ sthitaḥ||
380:640: iti me khedatā citte kāye'pi vidyate na hi|
380:641: sarvaṃ bhavān vijānīte tadarthe me prasīdatu||
380:656: iti mayoditaṃ śrutvā ratnottamaḥ sa sarvavit|
380:659: naitanme vidyate nūnaṃ tadanye prārthayerhi taṃ||
380:660: yadi te'sti samīcchā hi prāptuṃ vidyāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīm|
380:666: sa te śāstā mahābhijñaḥ sarvadharmādhipo jinaḥ|
380:671: tatra padmottamaṃ nāma saṃbuddha taṃ sabhāśritam|
380:681: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā padmottamaḥ sa sarvavit|
380:714: sarvairapi hi sarvajñaiḥ pramātuṃ naiva śakyate||
380:758: labdhā neyaṃ mahāvidyā ṣaḍakṣarī śrutāpi na||
380:761: bhagavan bhava me trātā bhartā gatiḥ parāyaṇaḥ|
380:767: sthāpaya māṃ śubhe dharme saṃpreraya sunirvṛtim||
380:797: iti niveditaṃ tena lokeśena niśamya saḥ|
380:828: gṛhītvā tāṃ jagadbhartā muktāmālāṃ sa dakṣiṇām|
380:830: amitābho munīndro'pi tāṃ mālāṃ pratigṛhya ca|
380:832: tatpradattāṃ samādāya tāṃ ca mālāṃ prabodhitaḥ|
380:834: tatra etanmahanmantraṃ śāstrā diṣṭaṃ yathā tathā|
380:836: tadā vighnagaṇāḥ sarve duṣṭā māragaṇā api|
380:854: japanti ya imāṃ vidyāṃ śṛṇvanti bhāvayantyapi||
380:855: dadhata ye ca bhāsanti manasā cintayantyapi|
380:867: yo mudā śraddhayā nityaṃ japedimāṃ ṣadakṣarīm|
380:878: tatrāhaṃ bhavatā śāstrā preṣaṇīyo hi sarvathā||
380:882: vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ sa saṃtiṣṭhate japan sadā||
380:887: bhagavanstatra yāsyāmi yatra śāstā sa tiṣṭhate|
380:892: vārāṇasyāṃ mahāpuryāṃ sthitaṃ taṃ sadguruṃ bhaje||
380:902: draṣṭavyaḥ sa tvayā naiva kulaputra tadanyathā|
380:903: vicikitsā na kartavyā dṛṣṭvā taṃ dharmabhāṇakam|
380:915: bhagavan bhavatā śāstrā yathājñaptaṃ tathā khalu|
380:916: kṛtvā taccharaṇe sthitvā bhajeyaṃ taṃ samādarāt||
380:938: tatra prāptaḥ sa viṣkambhī dṛṣṭvā taṃ dharmabhāṇakam|
380:940: tatra sa mudito dharmabhāṇakasya puro gataḥ|
380:946: iti vijñapya tasyāgre śāstuḥ sa sugatātmajaḥ|
380:960: śṛṇvanti ye sadā dharmaṃ bhavataḥ samupāśritāḥ|
380:974: bhajanti bhavatāṃ ye ca śaraṇe samupasthitāḥ|
380:978: jānante tava saṃbuddhāḥ sarve'pi daśadik sthitāḥ|
380:983: ye te dharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā bhajanti samupasthitāḥ||
380:993: kati mārṣāḥ kila kleśāḥ saṃsāra aupabhāgikāḥ||
380:1000: iti tena samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya sa vinoditaḥ|
380:1022: trātā nātho guruḥ śāstā sanmitraṃ sadguṇārthabhṛt|
380:1025: iti saṃprārthite tena śrutvā sa dharmabhāṇakaḥ|
380:1042: puṇyakṣetre gṛhe ranme pīṭhe pretālaye'pi ca||
380:1050: sunirvṛtiṃ na te yānti kṛtvāpi duṣkaraṃ tapaḥ|
380:1052: ye ca santo mahāsattvā bodhisattvāḥ śubhārthinaḥ|
380:1094: tato buddhapadaṃ prāpya kṛtvā dharmamayaṃ jagat||
380:1149: evaṃ te ca jagallokaṃ hitaṃ kṛtvā pramoditāḥ|
380:1154: yasyā anusmṛtimātreṇa sarve naṣṭā hi pāpakāḥ||
380:1155: ya enāṃ japate nityaṃ tasya yaḥ cīvaraṃ spṛśet|
380:1167: smaraṇaṃ śravaṇaṃ cāpi vinā puṇyairna labhyate||
380:1168: iti tena samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sa saṃpramoditaḥ|
380:1181: kuto'yaṃ carate śabda iti dhyātvā vyavasthitaḥ||
380:1186: niścarantaṃ suśabdaṃ taṃ śrutvā sa dharmabhāṇakaḥ|
380:1187: kuto'yaṃ carate śabda iti dhyātvā vyalokayet||
380:1188: samīkṣya sarvato dikṣu dhimān sa saṃvilokayan|
380:1193: dṛṣṭvā taṃ khe kajālīnaṃ bodhisattvaṃ jinātmajam|
380:1196: aṣṭāṃgaiḥ praṇatiṃ kṛtvā tasthau dhyātvā kṛtāṃjaliḥ||
380:1201: iti tena jagacchāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya saḥ|
380:1205: iti vijñapya lokeśaṃ tataḥ sa dharmabhāṇakaḥ|
380:1215: tatkṣaṇe sācalā sābdhiścacāla ṣaḍ vidhā mahī|
380:1219: tataḥ sa suprasannāatmā śatre tasmai sadakṣiṇām|
380:1222: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā sa mahābhijño dharmiṣṭho dharmabhāṇakaḥ|
380:1225: vaineyo bodhisattvastat gṛhṇīyāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ na te||
380:1226: etā ekākṣarasyāpi paryāptā na tu dakṣiṇā|
380:1227: prāgeva ṣaḍakṣarāṇāṃ gṛhṇiyāṃ te tathāpi na||
380:1228: tacchrutvā sa mahābhijño viṣkambhī tasya sadguroḥ|
380:1234: iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya sa vinoditaḥ|
380:1237: iti vijñapya taṃ muktāhāraṃ natvā samādade||
380:1238: tataḥ sa suprasannātmā viṣkambhī tasya sadguroḥ|
380:1242: tatra sa dūrataḥ paśyan bhagavantaṃ sabhāśritam|
380:1246: tatra sa bhagavān paśyan viṣkambhinaṃ samāgatam|
380:1255: adya me safalaṃ janma buddhaputro'smi sāmpratam|
380:1259: iti tenoditam śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ|
380:1264: saṃbuddhairbhāṣitā yā tāṃ dāsyāmi te jagaddhite||
380:1284: tataḥ sa trijagacchāstā kṛtvā dharmamayaṃ jagat|
380:1287: eṣā tvayā sadā dhāryā paṭhanīyā jagaddhite||
380:1295: dhṛtvā saṃpāṭhitā nityaṃ deśitā ca jagaddhite||
380:1300: āa oṃ cale cūle cunde svāhetyetannavākṣaram|
380:1302: śāstrā svayaṃ pradattaṃ tāṃ mahāvidyāṃ navākṣarīm|
380:1304: dhṛtvā viṣkambhinā śāstuḥ pāṭhemānā guroḥ puraḥ|
380:1317: kati santi tanau tasya sarvadharmādhipassya hi|
380:1319: iti saṃprārthite te viṣkambhinā sa sarvavit|
380:1327: tattasya śaraṇe sthitvā dhyātvā smṛtvā samāhitaḥ|
380:1329: ye tasya śaraṇe sthitvā dhyātvā smṛtvāpi sarvadā|
380:1331: durgatiṃ te na gacchanti yānti sadgatimeva hi|
380:1352: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ|
380:1375: iti saṃprārthite tena viṣkambhinā sa sarvavit|
380:1381: idānīṃ sa jagannāthaḥ sarvān sattvān bhavodadheḥ|
380:1432: ityādiṣṭaṃ sa munīndreṇa śrutvā maheśvaro mudā|
380:1433: lokeśasya puro gatvā pādābje praṇatiṃ vyadhāt||
380:1442: ityevaṃ sa maheśānaṃ sthutvā taṃ śrīguṇākaram|
380:1474: sarvasattvān vaśe sthāpya dharmarājo balī bhaveḥ||
380:1482: tatastvaṃ bhagavān sarvaṃ kṛtvā dharmamayaṃ jagat||
380:1495: ityumā sā mahādevī saṃtuṣṭā taṃ jinātmajam|
380:1501: iti tayā mahādevyā saṃprārthitaṃ niśamya saḥ|
380:1503: bhagini tvaṃ mahādevi nirvṛtiṃ yadi vāṃchasi|
380:1514: umeśvara iti khyātaḥ saṃbuddho bhagavān jinaḥ|
380:1523: atha sa bhagavān sarvān sabhālokān samīkṣya tam|
380:1541: sarveṣāmapi teṣāḥ sa lokanāthaḥ śiraḥ spṛśan|
380:1548: iti saṃprārthite tena lokeśena sa sarvavit|
380:1551: upahṛtya puraḥ pṛcchaḥ kauśalyaṃ madgirā nameḥ||
380:1553: bhagavantaṃ praṇatvā ca sabhāṃ samīkṣya prācarat||
380:1558: samīkṣya taṃ samāyātaṃ lokeśvaraṃ sa sarvavit|
380:1562: kiyanto hi tvayā sattvā samuddhṛtāḥ kutaḥ kutaḥ|
380:1570: evaṃ tān sakalān sattvān kṛtvā saṃbodhisādhinaḥ|
380:1578: sa mayā vyākṛto bodhau somāpi vyākṛtā tathā||
380:1584: idaṃ ratmayaṃ padmaṃ kauśalyaṃ cāpi pṛcchyate||
